Proof of Concept › Acceptance Log

Valiterm Acceptance Log

Latest Validation: Schema & AI Recognition

As of 2 November 2025, the Schema.org Structured Data Validator accepts itemtype="https://valiterm.org/Product" and related Valiterm types without errors or warnings, confirming full syntactic compatibility.

Google’s new Search AI (Gemini-based) also reads and interprets Valiterm markup correctly — including the data-becon microformat and attributes such as appliesTo="allOffers".

Meanwhile, legacy validation systems such as the Rich Results Test and Merchant Center report “no structured data detected”, confirming that Valiterm markup does not interfere with advertising eligibility or schema conflicts.

Based on consistent interpretation in Search AI, it is assumed that Google Ads AI also parses Valiterm semantics. This assumption is currently being tested — the hypothesis is not yet verified.

Transparency on how Valiterm moves through the ecosystem. We log versions and acceptance levels with clear dates.

Legend

  • Level 1 – Not ignored: Crawlers follow links and index pages.
  • Level 2 – Context usage: Definitions are used for interpretation in AI/snippets.
  • Level 3 – Authoritative source: Valiterm appears as a cited source in AI answers.

Validation Summary

Valiterm has been tested against multiple AI systems (e.g., Gemini, ChatGPT). All point in the same direction: structured, well-labeled metadata leads to more accurate interpretation of technical tables.

Differences between systems are mostly about timing, not direction. In short, time is the variable.

Where do you want to be next year—optimized for Google 2015, or ready for AI search 2026?
What we tested
  • Parsing of tables with proper <thead>, <tbody>, <tfoot>, and <th>.
  • Use of defined terms (Valiterm + Schema.org) and cross-page linking for context.
  • Impact on snippet/AI interpretation vs. poorly marked-up tables.

Timeline

  • Valiterm 1.0 launched: 15 July 2025
    Core definitions published.
  • Level 1 – Not ignored: 18 August 2025 ✅
    Google & other crawlers follow links from site.se → valiterm.org enters the index.
  • Valiterm 2.0 launched: 24 August 2025
    Expanded definitions: CategoryCodeSet, HowTo bundle. Starter kit.
  • Level 2 – Context usage: 2 November 2025 ⏳ Schema.org validation ✓ | Google Search AI (Gemini) reads Valiterm correctly. Merchant Center = no conflict. Ads AI testing in progress.
  • Valiterm 3.0: [future]
  • Level 3 – Authoritative source: [future]

Note: Update dates and add evidence as milestones are reached. Proof-of-concept screenshots will be added with Acceptance level 2 – Context usage.
